ModMetaData.name: Cannibal Meals (continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Adds cannibal versions of all base meals.
General • Add these recipes/meals: Pemmican, Simple Meal, Fine Meal, Lavish Meal, Packaged Survival Meal • Has added texture on the original textures to indicate cannibal-version. • Stats and nutritions are the same as the original meals.
Compatibilities • Compatible with existent saves and other mods.
Note: Do not use this mod and my other VGP-enabled mod at the same time
--- This is just a reupload for 1.0 version since original is still in B18 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1297883744
